exploreTokensLegalDisclaimer: Hannun jari da suka zama tokin sune tushen kayan aikin blockchain waɗanda wasu ɓangarorin na uku suka ƙira don bin tushen cikawar mallakar kadara. Yayin da suke bin sauye-sauyen farashin da hanyoyin cinikin dukiya, ba sa ba da haƙƙin mallaka ko fa'idodin masu hannun jari. Ana samun su a zaɓaɓɓun yankuna kawai. Ana samar da jerin tokin ta hanyar amfani da bayanan kasuwanci da aka bayar ta wasu masu ba da sabis na ɓangare uku ciki har da CoinGecko, Birdeye, Jupiter da Hyperliquid. Ayyukan da suka gabata baya nunin aikin gaba.
swapperTokensLegalDisclaimer: Ana fitar da tokin masu tashe ne ta hanyar amfani da kididdigar kasuwa da kamfanonin waje irin su CoinGecko, Birdeye, da Jupiter ke samarwa. homeDisclaimerTokenLists: Ana samar da jerin tokin ta hanyar amfani da bayanan kasuwa da aka samar daga masu samar da wani ɓangare na uku da suka haɗa da CoinGecko, Birdeye, Jupiter, da Hyperliquid. Ayyukan da aka nuna sun dogara ne akan lokacin da aka zaɓa. Ayyukan da suka gabata baya ba nunin aikin gaba ba ne.
homeDisclaimerPerps: Yi cinikin kwangiloli saya da sayarwar kadara ya ƙunshi babban haɗari, hade da yuwuwar babban asarar da jimillar saka hannun jarin ka da dukiya mai daraja saboda babban karin-rance da rashin daidaituwar kasuwa, kuma maiyuwa bazai dace da duk masu amfani ba. Za a iya rinjayar farashin ta hanyar ƙimar kuɗi da rufewar kasuwancin kuɗi kuma ana iya zama batun rufewar kasuwancin kuɗi ta atomatik ba tare da sanarwa ba. Bayanan kasuwa da Hyperliquid ya bayar. Ana samun kwangilolin saya da sayarwar kadara a cikin zaɓaɓɓun yankuna kawai.
homeDisclaimerTokenizedStocks: Hannun Jarin da Suka Zama Tokin sune tushen kayan aikin blockchain waɗanda wasu ɓangarorin na uku ke bayarwa waɗanda aka gyara don bi yi aikin hannun jarin kamfani. Yayin da suke bin sauyin farashin da hanyar aikin ainihin kudin hannun jari, ba sa ba da haƙƙin mallaka ko fa'idodin masu hannun jari. Ana samun su a zaɓaɓɓun yankuna kawai.
homeDisclaimerUK: Ana samar da jerin tokin ta hanyar amfani da bayanan kasuwa da aka samar daga masu samar da wani ɓangare na uku da suka haɗa da CoinGecko, Birdeye, Jupiter, da Hyperliquid. Ayyukan da aka nuna sun dogara ne akan lokacin da aka zaɓa. Ayyukan da suka gabata baya ba nunin aikin gaba ba ne. Ana iya samun Hannun Jarin da Suka Zama Tokin da Perps a zaɓaɓɓun yankuna kawai.

perpsAutoCloseClosePositionWhenPrice: Rufe ciniki in farashi ya kai:
perpsAutoCloseTakeProfitPnlPercent: Set your take-profit level as a percentage gain from your entry. When your unrealized PnL reaches this percentage, an order will be triggered to close the position. Actual execution price may vary due to market conditions.
perpsAutoCloseStopLossPnlPercent: Set your stop-loss level as a percentage loss from your entry. When your unrealized PnL drops to this percentage, an order will be triggered to close the position. Actual execution price may vary due to market conditions, and losses could exceed this amount in volatile markets.
perpsAutoCloseTakeProfitPnlDollars: Enter the profit amount at which you'd like to take profit. When your unrealized PnL reaches this value, an order will be triggered to close the position. Actual execution price may vary due to market conditions.
perpsAutoCloseStopLossPnlDollars: Enter the target loss amount at which to close the position. When your unrealized PnL drops to this value, an order will be triggered to close the position. In volatile markets, the actual loss may exceed this amount.
perpsAutoCloseTakeProfitPrice: Set the market price at which to take profit. When the market reaches this price, an order will be triggered to close your position. Execution price may vary due to slippage and market conditions.
perpsAutoCloseStopLossPrice: Set the market price where you want to limit losses. When the market reaches this price, an order will be triggered to close your position. In fast-moving markets, execution may occur at a worse price, and losses could exceed your target.
